title: nIlakaNTham bhAvayE
sahitya:
nIlakaNTham bhAvayE sadAshivam haram tApatraya haram


anupallavi

  bAla nayana kapAla mAla bhujanga gangA candram dharam vara


caraNam    pankajAsana padma lOcana garva haram aruNAcaleShvaram
sundarEshvaram dantimukha mudam santa sannuta sAmba shankaram
				(madhyamakAla)
Ananda tANDavAkAram ati karuNa kAlikA nAtham
akhila bhuvana madhAravasuram gaNapatim girirAja pUjitam
